<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Corpse Stench](/Feats.aspx?ID=3512) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Olfactory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=246" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 49</row>

**Archetypes** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178), [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182) (Level 14)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghoul Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3504)

</column>

---

Your body exudes an overwhelming scent of decay in a 10-foot emanation, so putrid that it nauseates creates within that range. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or be [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (plus slowed 1 on a critical failure). While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to Corpse Stench for 1 minute.
name: Corpse Stench
